comment: fantastic teacher. would take her for every class if I could. She's a bit of a tough grader but she's always available to help and she makes it very clear what she wants. gives lots of freedom to write what you want and is really great all year. gives lots of work from home days

Mrs. Wells is a great teacher if you want an easy class. Show up and follow directions, and you should be fine. If you're really looking to improve your writing skills, however, she may not be the best professor for you. She teaches high school full time, and it's she doesn't have much time to help you individually. But she's very funny!!

She is a good professor and very chill and funny. She is always willing to help you succeed. She is a fairly tough grader when it comes to papers but if you do your best you should be fine getting an A or B should be no problem. The papers assigned are not that hard either and you are given plenty of time to complete assignments.
rating_tags: Tough Grader--ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS--Would take again

comment: This was my first semester back in 6 years. Prof. Wells made the transition smooth for me. She expects you to come to class and come prepared. She doesn't appreciate slackers or tardiness but expects you to put effort into her class. Super nice, helpful, responds to emails throughout the day and fairly quickly. Great class.

She is amazing! Loved her so much in English 1101 that I took 1102 with her too! She's funny, super cool and easy going. There are a few essays you must write plus a final presentation which is not stressful at all (And I'm super shy!). There are rare occasions were she might give you at-work study/work time. Loved every day I went to lectures!
Very helpful and understanding.  Fun teacher and fun writing class.  Just show up to class and do the assignments.
She is the best english teacher. very helpful, and funny. Thank you Ms. Wells

I lucked out this was the only class i had to choose due to late enrollment. Turns out this teacher is amazing. She was very helpful and all she asks is do the work. YOU HAVE TO SHOW UP FOR CLASS. gives a lot of freedom on papers. She even took the next class up to teach at the request or many in the class. Great Teacher
She is intelligent, awesome, funny, and chill. Show up on time, and do your work is all she asks. She is a great teacher. If you have a question, she is willing to help.
Professor Wells is fabulous! She expects you to learn but will go the extra mile to help you in any way. THANKS PROF WELLS!!

She was an okay teacher; a little annoying at times, tedious, harsh grader at times. There's way too much reading for a composition course. You HAVE to read prior to just about every class because she has essay quizzes over the readings. However, she does try to help you improve your writing and is pretty nice.
Fhe's extremely helpful and cares if you do. Attendance is mandatory. Made my semester so much easier!

She is wonderful! She expects you to come to class, read the text, and write good papers. She is extremely helpful and willing to go the extra mile. She made my first semester in college so much less stressful! I highly recommend her but do not take her if you plan on an easy A.
